message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SD, cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.DB. 

The paper deals with the problem of author name homonymy in co-author networks, which is a common issue in bibliometric analysis. The paper proposes a new algorithm to ameliorate such distortions and evaluates its performance in improving the resolution of mesoscopic network structures. The paper is likely to be categorized under cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) as it deals with co-author networks, cs.SD (Software Development and Programming) as it proposes a new algorithm, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) as it deals with bibliometric analysis, cs.DL (Digital Libraries) as it deals with large-scale data, and cs.DB (Databases) as it deals with network analysis.
